definition: surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: Being a woman is synonymous with being a second-class citizen, in her opinion.
sentences.chinese: 在她看来，做女人是做二等公民的同义词。

sentences.english: We should pay attention to synonym discrimination.
sentences.chinese: 我们应注意对同义词的辨析。

sentences.english: Khiva's name became synonymous with cruelty and barbarity in contemporary Britain when, in 1842, two army officers, Colonel Charles Stoddart and Captain Arthur Conolly, were beheaded here in public.
sentences.chinese: 在当代英国，希瓦这个名字是残暴和野蛮的同义词。

sentences.english: The semantic synonym expansion mechanism is limited to expand simple keyword queries.
sentences.chinese: 语义同义词扩展机制仅限于扩展简单的关键字查询。

sentences.english: By default, assign a much smaller integer to all the synonyms.
sentences.chinese: 默认情况下，为所有同义词指定一个较小的整数。

sentences.english: In their minds, effort is synonymous with discomfort.
sentences.chinese: 在他们心目中，努力是不适的同义词。

sentences.english: Eveningwear is practically synonymous with sexy.
sentences.chinese: 晚装似乎就是性感的同义词。

sentences.english: Network marketing is synonymously referred to as Multi-Level-Marketing or MLM.
sentences.chinese: 网络营销是同义词称为多层次营销还是传销。

sentences.english: Synonyms can have slightly different connotations.
sentences.chinese: 同义词之间的内涵意义会略微不同。

sentences.english: The words "partition" and "group" are used synonymously here.
sentences.chinese: 在此“划分”和“分组”用作同义词。

sentences.english: This restricts the size of each synonym to this maximum size.
sentences.chinese: 这将约束每个同义词的最大大小。

sentences.english: The term is often used synonymously with hydrocarbon indicator.
sentences.chinese: 该术语通常用做碳氢指示的同义词。
一部常用同义词辨析词典。

sentences.english: Some common parameters have synonyms, and a few have antonyms.
sentences.chinese: 一些常见的参数有同义词，而少数具有反义词。

sentences.english: There're many correspondent synonyms between connatural Korean words and those in ancient Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜语固有词与汉语有同义词群对应关系。

sentences.english: But the ancient Chinese synonyms research is weak in dribs and drabs.
sentences.chinese: 但是，目前古代汉语同义词的研究还比较零散和薄弱。

definition: part of speech (noun, verb, adjective etc)/lexical category
word (general term including monosyllables through to short phrases)/term (e.g. technical term)/expression
vocabulary/list of words (e.g. for language teaching purposes)/word
variant of 詞彙|词汇[ci2 hui4]
